title: This game has gone downhill (please read)
body: i started this game 4 or 5 months ago now been playing a lot my fps was fine when i started and was fine up until preseason came since preseason my game runs slow lags going into lobbies lags in game whenever i try to move PLEASE look into this as i am not the only person this is happening to. my fps is perfectly fine on other games and i have all my graphics set on very low so it's nothing to do with that, like i said please look into this problem! it got worse after the update yesterday can't play a single game without lagging anymore please work on this or i will be forced to quit this game and i don't want that after how much i've spent.

replies.body: I'd like to help pinpoint if this is an fps issue or network related on.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on the impacted games when you get a chance, and let me know your results.  We can go from there!
its fps i use sky fiber internet and my ms doesn't move off of 33 my fps drops and rises for no reason but i will run the reader when i finally un tilt enough to play another game
